title: Professional Portfolio
text:
Email: josiemb.bc@gmail.com
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/josiemb
Location: North Vancouver, BC




Technical: Python, R, SQL, Quarto/Markdown
Design: UI/UX, Accessible Web Design
Leadership: Project Management, Agile






I am a dedicated professional with over 5 years of experience in [Your Industry]. I specialize in bridging the gap between complex data and actionable insights, with a focus on creating accessible, user-centric digital experiences.





Jan 2021 – Present * Streamlined internal workflows, reducing project turnaround time by 20%. * Managed a cross-functional team of 10 to launch a flagship SaaS product. * Mentored junior developers in best practices for documentation and code clarity.



June 2018 – Dec 2020 * Developed automated reporting dashboards using R and Shiny. * Identified key market trends that led to a $50k increase in quarterly revenue.







University Canada West | 2026



Capilano University | 2021



Polytechnic University of the Philippines | Cum Laude






Adaptability: Thriving in fast-paced environments and pivoting when project requirements shift.
Communication: Translating technical jargon into clear, concise language for stakeholders.

title: Professional Portfolio
text:
Email: josiemb.bc@gmail.com
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/josiemb
Location: North Vancouver, BC




Technical: Python, R, SQL, Quarto/Markdown
Design: UI/UX, Accessible Web Design
Leadership: Project Management, Agile






Results-driven and detailed-oriented professional passionate to pursue a long-term career in a data science role. Proven track record of designing and implementing solutions, coupled with exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills. Demonstrated ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams to achieve project objectives. Committed to leveraging technical expertise to drive business growth and enhance operational efficiency.





Aug 2022 – Apr 2024 * Migrated and transformed data across heterogeneous systems using XML and XSL. * Provided client support globally, including troubleshooting for Laboratory Management System and its associated systems. * Collaborated with developers and users on requirements and specifications for new modules.



Nov 2021 – Aug 022 * Served as a key liaison between the university, prospective studends, current students, and faculty. * Prepared agendas and minutes, organized events and sessions, and maintained records using databases and spreadsheets. * Worked closely with the Registrar’s office to investigate and resolve issues.



Apr 2013 – Jul 2019 * Led a team of 30 staff members across 7 diverse departments. * Developed strategic direction for the information systems plan, including technology deployments and budgets. * Managed all aspects of IT systems. * Led the company’s transition from manual processing to automated solutions.







University Canada West | 2026



Capilano University | 2021



Polytechnic University of the Philippines | Cum Laude
